result.title: HackerEarth College Challenge
result.content:
Hello Coders.. Get ready for the college championship on Hackerearth today at 6:00pm. Its a 5 hour long contest.Go ahead and register Happy Coding Coders :)

if(link_found==true) cout<<"best of luck"<<endl; else goto https://www.hackerearth.com/code_hunt_80/
